name: Experimentation
description:
A linear visual novel in the adventure and psychological horror genre that tells five short stories that are not connected to each other.
Not recommended to play if you are depressed or in a bad psychological state!



  • Mirror
    When it seems like your day has been the worst of your life, it could always be worse. And sometimes you need to look in the mirror to realize the true cause of your anxiety.

  • Credit card
    Have you ever wondered how much money you need? And what you would spend it on? One day, a strange card falls into the hands of the heroes of the story at a bus stop...

  • Gamdev
    Every creative path is thorny. And when you give yourself all to your work, put your soul, you can stay without it.

  • Best Friend
    The more advances in technology we meet, the more we become distant from people. Then any communication is more valuable than ever, and every friend is worth their weight in gold.

  • Experimentation
    In a secret laboratory in Sunlight City, an alien creature is being studied, unknown how it came to earth. Since then, mysterious phenomena and strange objects have begun to occur.



A full playthrough will take you 60-90 minutes to complete. Add the game to your wish list, and in the meantime, have some pizza!
